Name: Dodge The Missionaries
About the game: Nothing gets the energy pumping like some banging music in a sweet ass venue, but what happens when the local religious folk rise up and revolt against the MetalHead movement and swarm you with the gospel? Play as 9 characters, 8 of which are based off of REAL PEOPLE on Twitch, and do your best to avoid the Missionaries and Bosses all while picking up illicit items to boost your score AND your speed across 3 completely designed and honed levels! Reach new heights and unlock any of the NEW 25 Achievements and keep track of your records! Features: Banging Music Tracks 3 complete sweat-inducing levels, one with a Blood Moon and Day / Night Cycle! 9 custom characters based off of REAL people 3 different bosses and 3 different Missionaries Multiple item pickups to boost speed, points, AND remove an enemy from the field! Highscore counter and Per Level score counter so you can flex on your friends 25 New Achievements! Fun environment and SFX to keep you engaged and entertained Satire GALORE!!! Credits: Big thanks to all who assisted in the development of this! We specifically want to thank the talented individuals who made their art and skills available for use, as we wouldn't have what we have without them! DavidKDB : Music Pixel_Poem : Level Assets WaltonSimmons : Level Assets Exuin : Level Assets Emmanuel Montero : Decoration / Interior Assets
